      • modifyPictureLocation

        String modifyPictureLocation(String content,
                           String oldDirectory,
                           String newDirectory)
                             throws AppException
        When we add new problem/article, we upload images into /{category}/new/, but after we save it we should move images into right place.
        Parameters:
        content - old article content
        oldDirectory - old directory, match the prefix
        newDirectory - new directory
        Returns:
        modified content
        Throws:
        AppException
